Here is a bullet list of required elements:

*   Spanish text for "1 Safety Instructions"
*   Orange underline below title
*   Spanish text for "Note: Before using this product, please carefully read the following important safety information."
*   Spanish text for "1.This electric scooter can be used by one adult only. Never carry others."
*   Spanish text for "2.Wear safety helmet and other protective equipment while using this product."
*   Spanish text for "3.Never ride this product in an unsafe or illegal place."
*   Spanish text for "4.Please practice in an open area (not on lanes) first and use this product until you are skilled in operation."
*   First light grey rounded rectangle container (for first illustration set)
*   Red prohibition icon (crossed circle) within the first container
*   Line drawing of two people on one scooter, side view
*   Line drawing of two people on one scooter, front view with passenger as backpack
*   Second light grey rounded rectangle container (for second illustration set)
*   Red approval icon (checkmark in circle) within the second container
*   Line drawing of a head wearing a helmet, side view
*   Line drawing of a knee with a knee pad
*   Third light grey rounded rectangle container (for third illustration set)
*   Red prohibition icon (crossed circle) within the third container
*   Line drawing of a "no scooter" sign on a post
*   Line drawing of a person on a scooter with motion lines, approaching the sign
*   Fourth light grey rounded rectangle container (for fourth illustration set)
*   Red prohibition icon (crossed circle) within the fourth container
*   Line drawing of a person on a scooter on a road, front view
*   Line drawing of a car on the road
*   Line drawing of road lane markings (dashed center, solid edges)
